example.membership
Interface CookieBackedServiceData

All Known Implementing Classes:
MyNewsListData, UserBlogsData
public interface CookieBackedServiceData

Interface for service types that wish to have all or part of its persistent data cached in a browser cookie in order to minimize server requests.

Method Summary
 com.google.gson.JsonElement loadToJsonCookie()
          Load the persistent JSON data from persistent storage (content).
 void storeFromJsonCookie(com.google.gson.JsonElement jsonData)
          Store the given JSON data to persistent storage (content).
 

Method Detail

loadToJsonCookie

com.google.gson.JsonElement loadToJsonCookie()
                                             throws com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException
Load the persistent JSON data from persistent storage (content). This method is called when a user logs in using the /membership/login URL.

Returns:
the persistent data
Throws:
com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException - if the persisted data is not valid JSON data

storeFromJsonCookie

void storeFromJsonCookie(com.google.gson.JsonElement jsonData)
Store the given JSON data to persistent storage (content). This method is called when an AJAX post is done to the /membership/persist URL.

Parameters:
jsonData - the data to persist
